Class OASession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.jsp.OABase
      • com.viaoa.jsp.OASession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class OASession
extends OABase
    Object used by one user session.
    See Also:
    OAApplication.createSession(), Serialized Form

                      int x)

      • setCookie

        public void setCookie(String name,
                      String value)
        For this to work oaheader.jsp needs to call setResponse() & setRequest(). Uses Servlet.Response to create a cookie. MaxAge is set to max.

      • getCookie

        public String getCookie(String name)
        uses Servlet.Request to get a cookie. For this to work oaform.jsp & oabeans.jsp need to call setResponse() & setRequest()
